cn.title: 比特派首个“广告位”开启

message.data: 众所周知，比特派是没广告的，作为把用户体验放到第一位的团队，我们对于任何能干扰用户体验的功能都是拒绝的，这里面当然也包括了广告。
但比特派作为领先的多区块链资产钱包，我们仍希望把更多、更好的第三方产品和服务推荐给用户，这又该如何做呢？
感谢 Uber，我们从 Uber App 的相关设计中获得了灵感，比特派的第一个“广告位”被设计在了发币完成界面，这一设计有如下好处：
1. 对用户的干扰最小：发币成功代表着一个事情的完成，此时展示一些相关广告并没有打断用户的操作，也不会让用户有任何不适；
2. 有利于广告方的精准投放：完成发币操作的用户，无论是比特币，还是以太坊，或者是 EOS，甚至其他币种，毫无疑问都是真正的区块链用户，精准投放的意义很大；
3. 未来这一广告位还会设计成更加人工智能的广告策略，比如说，针对于发送 EOS 的用户推送 EOS DApp 的广告，针对于发送 ETH 的用户推送一些高品质项目的广告等；
4. 另外，这一广告位还可以专门设计糖果空头策略，一方面让用户完成发币操作后还能得到一些“甜头”，另一方面也给了项目方更多的与用户建立联系的方法；
当前比特派钱包的重度用户比例非常高，用户的存币量、日活跃量、各币种的发币次数和发币量都处于行业内领先的状态，相当大比例的场外交易者、矿工、IXO 参与者、DApp 玩家都是我们的用户，您还在等什么呢？
比特派首个“广告位”的第一批伙伴征集活动即日起开始，至10月20日结束，有意者请速与 b@bitpie.com 联系。

en.title: The First Paid Placement is Coming

message.data: In a long run, Bitpie always put the users experience at the first place—we refuse to provide any function that harm user experience, of course including Advertisement.
Nevertheless, as a leading multi-assets wallet, Bitpie is committed to recommend more better third-party products and services. The point is how would we achieve this?
Owing to Uber, we got inspired from the design of its App. The first paid placement of Bitpie is designed at the coin-sending completion page. The followings are the seasons why we decide to do so:
1.Minimal interference to the users: coin-sending success is a completion of a series of operations. Showing some related Ad will not interrupt user’s operation and hence bring no discomfort to user.

2.Being helpful to display Ad to target users: the users who completed the coin sending (regardless of btc, eth, eos or other coins or tokens) are the real blockchain assets owners. Showing Ad to them is a precise recommendation.
3.In the future, this paid placement will integrate AI strategies. For instance, we will push EOS DApp Ads to EOS senders, or push some high-quality projects’ Ad to eth senders.

4.In addition, this advertising position is also suitable to do some giveaways. On one hand, senders are free to receive some airdrops, on the other hand, it is a good way for projects to get close connections with their investors or users.

At present, heavy users account for a very high proportion in Bitpie Wallet; the assets scale, DAU, daily sending times and sending amounts are all at a leading place in the industry. Our users include a large number of OTC trader, miners ICO participants and DApp players, what are you waiting for?
The first batch of partners collection for Bitpie’s first Paid Placement starts from now on to 20th October. Don’t hesitate to reach out to contact us for business collaboration: b@bitpie.com .

Bitpie Team
